title: Breaking Down the Restaurant Wars on ‘Top Chef: Portland’ and a Conversation With ‘For All Mankind’ Showrunner Ron Moore
description:
Chris and Andy talk about the news that Amazon is in talks to buy MGM for the hefty price of $9 billion (1:00). Then they get into this week’s episode of ‘Top Chef,’ which marks the beginning of Restaurant Wars (8:40). Finally, Chris talks with Ron Moore, the showrunner of ‘For All Mankind’ (28:35).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Ron Moore
Producer: Kaya McMullen
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
